doc:
Ernie Rice https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ernie_Rice 0 John Tomasso (17 November 1896 – 1979), better known as Ernie Rice, was a British boxer who was British and European lightweight champion between 1921 and 1922. After retiring from boxing he became an actor, appearing in several films and television series. John_Tomasso ( 17_November_1896 – 1979 ) , better_known as Ernie_Rice , was a_British_boxer who was British_and_European lightweight_champion between 1921_and_1922 . After retiring from boxing he became an_actor , appearing in several_films_and_television_series .
